message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $13,000. I believe this product will be very valuable for you.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I understand your position, Bob, but $10,000 is a bit too low for me.  How about we agree on $11,500?  It's a fair compromise that reflects the value this product brings.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,500?
